title: Immersive Keywords Dataset
description: Schema for keyword frequency datasets (daily/raw and yearly aggregated) tracking immersive-media keyword mentions in global online news.

keyword.description: The immersive-media keyword or control keyword being tracked.

date.description: Date of the count (YYYY-MM-DD for daily files, YYYY-01-01 for yearly aggregated).

count_mentions.description: Number of article mentions of the keyword on that date/time unit.

count_articles.description: Number of articles processed on that date/time unit (denominator for normalization).

normalized_rate.description: Mentions per 100 (or per defined unit) articles, normalised for comparability.

region.description: Optional region or language filter, if the count is region-specific.

notes.description: Optional free‚Äêtext notes about anomalies, gaps or data quality issues on that row.
